::Zardus/Autofire::

Zardus sees the oncoming missiles, firing two blasts from his new
optic lasers at them to destroy them. Most of the lasers hit him in
the back, denting the armor covering his jetpack. He looks back only
to be hit by more shots, these ones coming from Autofire.

Zardus growls, accelerating and firing his energy draining missile
launcher twice at Unitron, then firing a normal missile from his gun
at Autofire. Out of the corner of his eyes, he sees Predacons arrive
and begin to attack the NDE.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Autofire rolls out of the way of the missiles, turning around for
another pass at Zardus.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (IR, Double Punch is cloaked, so unless you used some special
scanner it 
> would be impossible to target/see him.)
> 
> The Protectobots/The Oblitercons/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark
Claw/Nemesis
>
Enforcer/Scattershot/Imprisoner/Predator/Choran/Shockwave/Unitron/Firestarter/
> Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Vehement/Sun
Crusher/Reflector/Smokescreen:
> 
> 
> 
> Demon Wulf watched the massive team up on Dark One and turned his
head, 
> firing off five rapid optic blasts at the Cybertronian Fire,
ignoring autogun 
> fire striking his form.
> 
> ---
> 
> Flesh Ripper felt forty shells bounce off of his chest, the force of
the 
> numerous rounds knocking him back a few feet.  He looked down to his
chest, 
> which was covered with small dents.  "You'll pay for that!" he
yelled, 
> getting ready to charge, but saw two missiles heading for the
Oblitercon who 
> had opened fire on him and he jumped to avoid the resulting
explosion.
> 
> ---
> 
> Dark Claw felt small explosions on his frame, the grenades doing
little 
> damage.  He armed his launchers, firing two missiles at Breakdown
and two 
> missiles at the Cybertronian Fire, autogun fire striking already
damaged 
> areas all over his frame.
> 
> ---
> 
> 
> Slowly getting up, Dark One barely jumped out of the way of the ion
disks, 
> landing on his right side hard.
> 
> ---
> 
> Breakdown let out a yell as missiles struck him in the back, nearly
sending 
> him flipping forward.  Turning around, mech-fluid leaking down his
back, he 
> raised his greande launcher, but realized Injector was to far away. 
So he 
> fired three optic blasts at his opponent.
> 
> ---
> 
> Pyro slowed down, no one pursuing him.  He raised his cannon, firing
off 
> three fireballs at Vehement.
> 
> ---
> 
> Hiss remained silent, still hurting badly.
> 
> ---
> 
> Scavenger was struck by a missile, sending him flipping through the
air, the 
> inside of vehicle mode badly burnt and smashed up.  Scavenger's
scanners 
> could make out Hiss going through the air quickly in the opposite
direciton.
> 
> ---
> 
> Hot Spot saw the five images of Headstrong and fired two fireballs,
one at 
> two different of them, and jumped out of the way of one of the light
blasts, 
> the other burning a large hole in his chest that leaked mech-fluid.
> 
> ---
> 
> Groove got up slowly, firing two photon blasts at Sinnertwin's
torso.
> 
> ---
> 
> Blades felt weapons fire blowing into his armor, knocking him back
through 
> the air against his engines.  The apache whined as it turned, arming 
> missiles.  Two missiles launched out at Shockwave.  "You're Emperor
of 
> nothing!"
> 
> ---
> 
> First Aid slowly got up, looking at the Autobot who had saved him. 
"Thanks.  
> Who are you?" he asked, a little flummoxed.
> 
> ---
> 
> Streetwise ran forward, raising his pistol and firing off three
photon blasts 
> at Reflector's sternum.  "Take that you Decepticreep wanna be!"
> 
> ---
> 
> Imprisoner activated the laser cannon attached to his frame, the
large cannon 
> firing off three powerful laser blasts at the CF were heading
straight for 
> the damaged ship.
> 
> ---
> 
> Predator dodged some autogun fire from the Element.  "You'll have to
do 
> better than that." he chuckled, raising the rocket launcher on his
shoulder 
> and firing off a missile straight at the CF.
> 
> ---
> 
> Choran had finished with his modifications and took aim.  He held
the trigger 
> down for a few seconds, twenty-two laser bolts blasting out at
Prowl's torso.
> 
> ---
> 
> Nemesis Enforcer raised his rifle, firing off twenty-five rapid
laser bolts 
> at one of Headstrong's hollow images.
> 
> ---
> 
> Scattershot took aim, firing off ten armor-piercing rounds at
Divebomb. (If 
> he's still at the battle).
> 
> ---
> 
> Shockwave spinned in the air, the two missiles from Blades passing
by 
> harmlessly and exploding.  Shockwave got a lock and fired off ten
rapid laser 
> blasts at Blades.
> 
> "I am a Decepticon Emperor you moronic Autobot.  Your resistance
will only 
> drain resources."
> 
> ---
> 
> Two flares launched on at the last minute on an intercept course
with the 
> incoming missiles, the explosions burning Unitron's frame slight. 
Arming his 
> missiles once more he fired off two missiles at the Cybertronian
Fire, ten 
> rapid laser blasts lancing out from his nosecone at Zardus.
> 
> "Prepare to die, traitor."
> 
> ---
> 
> Firestarter barrel rolled, avoiding three charges, the other blowing
a gash 
> into his armored space fighter form.  Those were hits he couldn't
take.  
> Arming his missile launchers he fired off two energy-signature
seeking 
> missiles at Zardus from his left launcher and fired off twenty-three
rapid 
> laser blasts at the Cybertronian Fire from his nosecone.
> 
> "Puny Maximals, you are more pathetic than your anscestors, the
Autobots."
> 
> ---
> 
> Beeline the lifeless cyber-bee fired two optic blasts on an
intercept course 
> with the charges heading for Double Punch.
> 
> Double Punch looked at the explosions in the air and laughed,
raising both 
> pinchers and launching a total of two missiles at the Cybertronian
Fire from 
> his left pincher.
> 
> He broke into a run, getting a target lock and firing two
energy-signature 
> seeking missiles at Cliffjumper.
> 
> (By the way, DP is cloaked)
> 
> ---
> 
> Manterror pulled hard left through the air, barely avoiding the
charges from 
> the CF and the explosion of the charges sent a light coating of fire
over his 
> green body, dimming it.
> 
> "ARGH!  NOTHING CAN DEFEAT THE MANTERROR!" he screamed, raising both
arms and 
> firing off four ion disks at the Cybertronian Fire, two from both
arms.
> 
> ---
> 
> Injector raised his right arm, two stinger missiles heading for the 
> Cybertronian Fire.  Almost seemingly out of nowhere, optic blasts
struck 
> Injector, knocking him back through the air.  Though only a few
seconds later 
> Injector was stabalized.  "Who dares attack me?" he said, focusing
on 
> Breakdown.  "Ah, the mercenary.  A gun for hire is no match for
Injector of 
> the Neo Decepticon Empire!" he yelled, heading downward at top speed
for 
> Breakdown, the air resistance (that Yan was WRONG about) put pain on
the 
> wound in his sternum that was leaking a tiny bit of oil from exposed 
> circuitry.
> 
> He raised his left arm, firing two stinger missiles down at the
Oblitercon 
> Breakdown.
> 
> ---
> 
> Smokescreen exited the Cybertronian Fire, looking to Vehement
immediately.  
> He raised his heavy-laser rifle, charging the Brotherhood member who
as 
> rather far away.
> 
> "What I failed to do shall be righted, in Primus' name I swear." he
said, 
> while raising his rifle and taking aim at Vehement.  He cocked his
rifle, the 
> only thing he was waiting for was to be in range to open fire.
> 
> ---
> 
> Vehement didn't notice Smokescreen.  Fire balls from the pyromaniac
Pyro had 
> struck Vehement almost harmlessly, the charred armor invisible since
the 
> normal color of his armor was a deep black.
> 
> "You make your greatest mistake, Alliance trash." he said loud
enough for 
> Pyro to hear.  He raised his right arm, a barrel at the end of it. 
Two 
> energy-signature seeking missiles launched out at Pyro.
> 
> ---
> 
> Sun Crusher saw six shapes heading for him.  Raising his left arm he
launched 
> a single missile that he had explode prematurely.  Two charges were
still 
> inbound and Sun Crusher only now attempted to move out of the way,
one charge 
> blowing up against his left abs, creating a dent in his side that
was rather 
> painful.
> 
> But due to his training with the Brotherhood, he was able to hide
his pain 
> from others.  And pain he was in, though it was starting to
subside.  
> "Prepare for death!" he yelled, raising his right arm and firing off
two 
> missiles at the Cybertronian Fire.
> 
> ---
> 
> Reflector looked didn't know who Streetwise was talking to or that
he had 
> shot at him, but the Brotherhood member knew he had indeed been shot
at when 
> two photon blasts struck him in the chest, sending him backwards two
and a 
> half feet, the robot quickly regaining stabalization in the air.
> 
> "Heathens.  You think you can stop those in the righteous path? 
When the 
> Chaos-Bringer comes you shall feel the wrath of the righteous one
and his 
> followers." He raised both arms, launching two missiles from both
barrels on 
> each arm.
> 
> Four missiles launched from his left arm at the Cybertronian Fire. 
The other 
> arm sent two missiles at the Cybertronian Fire and two
energy-signature 
> seeking missiles at an idle robot.  First Aid.
